Files Headings

quickstart.js

This example targets Node 4 and up.

 
const cssnano = require('cssnano');

Add your CSS code here.

 
const css = `
h1 {
    color: #ff0000;
    font-weight: bold;
}
`;

Add your configuration here; see http://cssnano.co/options/ and http://cssnano.co/optimisations/ for more details.

For example you can turn off z-index rebasing by setting zindex: false in your config, or you can use safe: true which will turn off unsafe optimisations.

 
const opts = {

};

Compress the CSS asynchronously and log it to the console.

 
cssnano.process(css, opts).then(result => {
    console.log(result.css);
});
